mil4.6:1.1_0: Thero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇe paridīpesi.
mil4.6:1.3_1: upāsako saṅghena samānasukhadukkho hoti, dhammādhipateyyo hoti,
mil4.6:1.4_1: apagatakotūhalamaṅgaliko jīvitahetupi na aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisati,
mil4.6:1.4_4: na ca kuhanavasena sāsane carati, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti.
mil4.6:1.5_0: Ime kho, mahārāja, dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇā,
mil4.6:1.5_2: taṁ te yuttaṁ pattaṁ anucchavikaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ jinasāsanaparihāniṁ disvā abhivaḍḍhiṁ icchasi, karomi te okāsaṁ,
